img_summary: The image depicts the **Celestial Ribbon**, a mythical-grade general armor material in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is a rare crafting item obtained by defeating powerful bosses such as the Hundred-Eye Daoist Master in The Webbed Hollow, bosses in Flaming Mountain and Mount Huaguo, or through occasional chest finds. It can also be purchased from the Shrine in Mount Huaguo, emphasizing its importance in upgrading armor and progressing in the game.
